    • countGoalPoints

      public int countGoalPoints(PlayerField Player)
      CountGoalPoints counts the goal points of a player given the PlayerField note: this method is actually analog to the countCommonGoalPoints one, but for has been separated for clarity purpose
      Parameters:

      Returns:
